structuredData.summary: Genius inventor, billionaire, philanthropist, and hands-on Full Stack Engineer. Specializes in AI, robotics, and creating groundbreaking technologies that push the boundaries of science. Currently focused on sustainable energy solutions and advanced AI assistants.

experience.description: Leading innovation in defense, clean energy, and AI. Directly involved in the design and development of core technologies.
responsibilities: Managing R&D for multiple high-tech divisions
achievements: Created the Iron Man suit and subsequent AI systems (J.A.R.V.I.S., F.R.I.D.A.Y.)

education.degree: Multiple PhDs (Physics, Electrical Engineering, Computer Science)

awards.name: Numerous Innovation Awards
awards.description: For contributions to technology and humanity.

projects.name: Global Climate Control Initiative
projects.description: AI-driven system to mitigate climate change effects.
